new_example_english: I will wait for the right moment to tell my mother the truth about the situation

new_example: Tu aspetterai la fine della pandemia per organizzare il viaggio dei tuoi sogni?
new_example_english: Will you wait for the end of the pandemic to organize your dream trip?

new_example: Lei aspetterà che i figli crescano prima di riprendere a lavorare a tempo pieno
new_example_english: She will wait for the children to grow up before returning to full-time work

new_example_english: We will wait for the rain to stop before going out for a walk in the park

new_example: Voi aspetterete che si liberi un tavolo al ristorante o andremo da un'altra parte?

new_example_english: They will wait for sunset to take the most beautiful photographs during the romantic trip

new_example_english: I waited two hours at the dentist because he had an emergency with another patient

new_example_english: Have you waited long enough for a promotion at work or is it time to change?

new_example: Ha aspettato che tutti se ne andassero prima di confessare i suoi veri sentimenti
new_example_english: He waited for everyone to leave before confessing his true feelings

new_example: Abbiamo aspettato il momento perfetto per comprare la casa dei nostri sogni
new_example_english: We waited for the perfect moment to buy the house of our dreams

new_example: Avete aspettato invano l'arrivo degli amici che avevano promesso di venire alla festa?
new_example_english: Did you wait in vain for the arrival of friends who had promised to come to the party?

new_example_english: They waited years before realizing the project of opening a restaurant together

new_example: Ho sempre fame verso le undici di mattina perché faccio colazione molto presto
new_example_english: I'm always hungry around eleven in the morning because I have breakfast very early

new_example: Tu hai abbastanza tempo libero per dedicarti ai tuoi hobby preferiti durante la settimana?

new_example_english: She has an impressive collection of antique books in her personal home library

new_example_english: We have all the necessary documents to apply for a visa to travel to the United States

new_example: Voi avete mai avuto l'opportunità di visitare i musei più famosi dell'Europa occidentale?
new_example_english: Have you ever had the opportunity to visit the most famous museums in Western Europe?

new_example_english: They have a beautiful house in the countryside where they spend all spring and summer weekends

new_example_english: I will finally have the chance to meet my favorite writer at the literary conference

new_example_english: She will need help to transport all the furniture during the move

new_example_english: I had an incredibly beautiful day walking through the streets of the historic center

new_example_english: They had the possibility to travel all over the world thanks to their work
